title: How profitable is the hospitality industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: hospitality business is one of most of the time profitable worldwide , as it require one time huge investment afterwards small investment(like renovation, restoration, maintenance, advertisement, etc) . whole world travel for many reasons like leisure, adventure, to explore new thing,education, religion, jobs etc and the major thing which they require during traveling is a place where their all the needs( like room to take rest, quench there thirst and appetite, area for relaxation, fun adventure ) can b catered. so here comes the role of hospitality industry to fulfill there needs travelers are always demanding….and willing to give any amount in exchange of good service and comfort so if any one plans well according to the market and prepare a proper strategy to attract its guest, than after sometime of opening the property he will b owning a successful business. one should always upgrade himself and in business to compete with other and should always try to crate a good reputation in market. these a the core points which every person should keep in mind while running a hospitality business.
